    • Method Detail

      • createAuthenticationRequest

        public AuthenticationRequest createAuthenticationRequest(Notary notary)
        createAuthenticationRequest

        %%% BEGIN SOURCE CODE %%% 

                  eu.recred.fido.uaf.msg.AuthenticationRequest authRequest = new eu.recred.fido.uaf.msg.AuthenticationRequest();
                eu.recred.fido.uaf.msg.OperationHeader header = new eu.recred.fido.uaf.msg.OperationHeader();
                authRequest.challenge = requestHelper.generateChallenge();
                header.serverData = requestHelper.generateServerData(authRequest.challenge, notary);
                authRequest.header = header;
                authRequest.header.op = eu.recred.fido.uaf.msg.Operation.Auth;
                authRequest.header.appID = appId;
                authRequest.header.upv = new eu.recred.fido.uaf.msg.Version(1, 0);

                authRequest.policy = requestHelper.constructPolicy(acceptedAaids);
                // addKeyIDsToPolicy(authRequest.policy);

                return authRequest;
        %%% END SOURCE CODE %%%

        This function creates an authentication request

        AUTHreq 1.2.1.1

        Parameters:
        notary -
        Returns:
        See Also:
        AuthenticationRequest, OperationHeader
